Company: Texas Guaranteed Student Loan Corp. via subcontractor Hummingbird
Description of incident: Texas Guaranteed (TG) was              notified by subcontractor Hummingbird that on May 24, an employee              had lost a piece of equipment containing names and Social Security              numbers of TG borrowers. UPDATE              (6/16/06):TG now says              a total of 1.7 million people's information was compromised, 400,000              more than original estimate of 1.3 million.
